title: Qué Tranza
overview: Qué Tranza promises an unfiltered, laugh-out-loud experience that blends real-life dilemmas, wild anecdotes, and brutally honest advice. Each week, the hosts dive into personal stories submitted by listeners — tackling topics ranging from relationship drama and workplace chaos to existential questions — always with heart, humor, and just the right touch of irreverence. Whether listeners are dealing with heartbreak, family issues, or just need to disconnect from the daily grind, Qué Tranza offers a hilarious and heartfelt escape.
